title: Final.Fantasy.VII.Ultima.Edition-Chrysomyr - READ DESCRIPTION
description:
For all non-swedish speakers: information in English is aviable at the bottom of this document. PLEASE READ IT; IT CONTAINS IMPORTANT INFORMATION ON HOW TO GET THE GAME RUNNING.

Note: I've played through roughly half of the game, and nothing seems to be ripped out. This is very probably a full version - the reason for the small filesize is that the entire install file is heavily compressed.

Final Fantasy VII till PC, som requestat. Inte en "riktig" scenerelease, men nÃƒÂ¤stan. :P
Spelet ÃƒÂ¤r patchat och klart till senaste versionen och crackat med No-CD-crack.

VIKTIG INFORMATION OM HUR MAN FÃƒâ€¦R SPELET ATT FUNGERA ORDENTLIGT:
1. Packa upp .rar-filen med WinRAR. (duh)
2. KÃƒÂ¶r installationsfilen. VIKTIGT: se till att installera Goodies, den mappen innehÃƒÂ¥ller en del intressanta saker samt ett par patchar du kan behÃƒÂ¶va.
3. Om installationen verkar fastna under "Finishing installation", sÃƒÂ¥ fÃƒÂ¶rsÃƒÂ¶k stÃƒÂ¤nga/minimera alla ÃƒÂ¶ppna fÃƒÂ¶nster - det ÃƒÂ¤r sannolikt en ruta som frÃƒÂ¥gar om du vill installera nÃƒÂ¥got videotjosan - svara ja, annars fungerar inte filmerna.
4. NÃƒÂ¤r spelet ÃƒÂ¤r installerat, kÃƒÂ¶r FF7Config.exe och stÃƒÂ¤ll in allt som du vill ha det. Observera att rutan med "Nvidia-fixar" vid grafikinstÃƒÂ¤llningarna BARA ÃƒÂ¤r till fÃƒÂ¶r dem som faktiskt HAR ett RIVA 128 eller TNT - pÃƒÂ¥ andra kort stÃƒÂ¤ller det bara till problem.
5. KÃƒÂ¶r spelet (FF7.exe). Om du fÃƒÂ¥r problem (kraschar och liknande) och kÃƒÂ¶r Windows XP, hoppa till punkt 6. Om du kÃƒÂ¶r Windows 2000, hoppa till punkt 7.
6. Om spelet inte fungerar som det ska under WinXP, prova installera "Animevamp's (controversial) XP patch" ur /goodies/FFVII Patches.rar/Animevamp's (controversial) XP patch.zip. NÃƒÂ¤r du gjort detta ÃƒÂ¤r spelet inte lÃƒÂ¤ngre No-CD-crackat, sÃƒÂ¥ du kommer att behÃƒÂ¶va mounta de "FFVII Dummy Image (CD x).iso" som ocksÃƒÂ¥ ligger i FFVII Patches.rar med Daemon Tools.
7. Om spelet inte fungerar som det ska under Win2k (det kraschar i strider eller nÃƒÂ¤r man gÃƒÂ¥r in/ut ur rum/omrÃƒÂ¥den), fÃƒÂ¶lj dessa instruktioner (saxat frÃƒÂ¥n ffseven.com's FAQ) - lÃƒÂ¤s noteringarna efter metod 1 innan du fÃƒÂ¶rsÃƒÂ¶ker:

 Method 1:

   1. Install Service Pack 3 for Windows 2000
   2. Download and install the Windows Application Combatibility Toolkit 2.6
   3. Run the Compatibility Administration Tool from the toolkit.
   4. Click the 'Fix' button. In the dialog that appears, enter the name of the program (FF7), vendor (SquareSoft), browse to ff7.exe and then click 'Next'.
   5. Select 'None' for Operating System modes and click 'Next'.
   6. Under Fixes, check the boxes: EmulateWriteFile, Shrinker, VirtualRegistry and then click 'Next'.
   7. Click 'Select all' then 'Finish'.
   8. Click 'Run' and see if it works.

-------------------
(Notera att "1. Install Service Pack 3 for Windows 2000" inte behÃƒÂ¶vs om du redan har SP3 eller senare. Notera ocksÃƒÂ¥ att Windows Application Compatibility Toolkit 2.6  inte finns lÃƒÂ¤ngre, senaste ÃƒÂ¤r 3.0 - den finns att ladda ner hÃƒÂ¤r:
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=7fc46855-b8a4-46cd-a236-3159970fde94&amp;DisplayLang=en
Om den hÃƒÂ¤r metoden fungerar, tryck "Save" och spara .sdb-filen pÃƒÂ¥ ett lÃƒÂ¤mpligt stÃƒÂ¤lle. NÃƒÂ¤r du vill kÃƒÂ¶ra FF7 i fortsÃƒÂ¤ttningen startar du Compatibility Admin Tool, ÃƒÂ¶ppnar din .sdb-fil, markerar ff7.exe i listan till hÃƒÂ¶ger och vÃƒÂ¤ljer "Run". Notera att du mÃƒÂ¥ste vÃƒÂ¤lja sÃƒÂ¶kvÃƒÂ¤g varje gÃƒÂ¥ng - tryck bara pÃƒÂ¥ Browse sÃƒÂ¥ bÃƒÂ¶r du vara i rÃƒÂ¤tt katalog pÃƒÂ¥ en gÃƒÂ¥ng.)
-------------------

Method 2:

   1. Install the March 2001 Compatibility Update for Windows 2000 (reboot). Get it here
   2. Download and install the Windows 2000 Application Compatibility Toolkit 1.5. This is no longer available to download from Microsoft. You may be able to get hold of a copy somewhere
   3. Enable Compatibility Mode Technology:
          * Go to Start -&gt; Run...
          * Type the following: regsvr32 %systemroot%apppatchslayerui.dll
      (See Microsoft Knowledge Base Article - 279792 for more details)
   4. Install Final Fantasy VII (reboot)
   5. Run QFixApp from the toolkit
          * Use the browse button to select ff7.exe as the program to run
          * Under Layers, choose Win2000
          * Under Fixes, check the boxes: EmulateWriteFile, Shrinker, VirtualRegistry
          * Finally, hit 'Run...' and see if it works!

(Notera att denna metod INTE ÃƒÂ¤r testad av mig, alltsÃƒÂ¥ har jag ingen aning om den fungerar. Om metod 1 inte fungerar sÃƒÂ¥ kan man prova den hÃƒÂ¤r... inte annars.)

Dessa bÃƒÂ¥da metoder kan eventuellt ocksÃƒÂ¥ fungera fÃƒÂ¶r Windows 2003. Om du kÃƒÂ¶r 2003 och fÃƒÂ¥r det att fungera, posta gÃƒÂ¤rna hur du gjorde hÃƒÂ¤r.

8. LÃƒÂ¤s readme:n eller manualen om du inte spelat spelet fÃƒÂ¶rut, annars kan det bli lite svÃƒÂ¥rt att lÃƒÂ¤ra sig. Kontrollerna ÃƒÂ¤r lite underliga, bland annat.
9. Spela spelet och ha kul! :D
10. Om du fortfarande har problem, frÃƒÂ¥ga mig sÃƒÂ¥ kan jag fÃƒÂ¶rsÃƒÂ¶ka hjÃƒÂ¤lpa dig att fÃƒÂ¥ det att fungera.

=================INFORMATION IN ENGLISH==================
(For all you German and French guys - I know you're out there somwhere ;P)
Please read the following, it contains important information on how to get the game running, especially under Windows 2000.

Final Fantasy VII for PC, as requested.
Almost a scene release, but not really. :P
The game comes pre-patched with all the official patches and a No-CD crack.

Installation notes/how to get it working if it crashes:
1. UnRAR the .rar file with WinRAR. (duh)
2. Run the installation file - be sure to install the "goodies" as it contains many interesting things as well as important patches you may need.
3. If the installation seems to be stuck at the "Finishing installation" part, it's probably a question box asking you if you want to install some video-stuff (click yes or the in-game movies won't work) hidden somewhere under another window.
4. When the installation is complete, run FF7Config.exe (if you didn't tell the installation to do it for you) and set everything up as you want it. Note that the "Nvidia" checkboxes in the "Graphics" tab is ONLY meant for people that actually HAVE a RIVA 128 or TNT - they just mess the game up on all other cards.
5. Run the game (FF7.exe). If it crashes or behaves strangely and you're running Windows XP, please continue reading at "6.". If it crashes or behaves strangely and you're running Windows 2000 (or Windows 2003), please continue reading at "7.".
6. If the game crashes or goes all evil on you under Windows XP, you can try to solve the problem by installing the "Animevamp's (Controversial) XP patch" from the /goodies/FF7 Patches.rar/Animevamp's (Controversial) XP patch.zip directory in your FF7 folder. Note that when (if) you install this patch, the game isn't No-CD-cracked anymore, and since there are no working No-CD cracks to this particular patch, you'll have to mount the "FFVII Dummy Image (CD x).iso" CD images with Daemon Tools to get the game running. The dummy images are also in the /goodies/FFVII Patches.rar archive.
7. If the game crashes under Windows 2000 (in the beginning of a battle or when entering/exiting rooms or areas), try this solution ("stolen" from ffseven.com's FAQ) - please read the notes below Method 1 before trying it:

 Method 1:

   1. Install Service Pack 3 for Windows 2000
   2. Download and install the Windows Application Combatibility Toolkit 2.6
   3. Run the Compatibility Administration Tool from the toolkit.
   4. Click the 'Fix' button. In the dialog that appears, enter the name of the program (FF7), vendor (SquareSoft), browse to ff7.exe and then click 'Next'.
   5. Select 'None' for Operating System modes and click 'Next'.
   6. Under Fixes, check the boxes: EmulateWriteFile, Shrinker, VirtualRegistry and then click 'Next'.
   7. Click 'Select all' then 'Finish'.
   8. Click 'Run' and see if it works.

--------------------
Notes on method 1: This method is tested by me and WORKS (at least for me).
The step "1. Install Service Pack 3 for Windows 2000" won't be needed if you already have SP3 or later (duh). Also note that the Windows Application Compatibility Toolkit 2.6 is outdated. The latest version, 3.0 at the time of writing, is aviable at:
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=7fc46855-b8a4-46cd-a236-3159970fde94&amp;DisplayLang=en
If this method works, press "Save" and save the .sdb file in some appropriate place. When you want to run FF7 later on, you'll have to start the Compatibility Admin Tool, press "Open", open your .sdb file, highlight the "FF7.exe" entry in the tree on the right, and press Run. Note that you'll have to specify the path each time - just press "Browse" and you should be in the right directory at once.
----------------------------

Method 2:

   1. Install the March 2001 Compatibility Update for Windows 2000 (reboot). Get it here
   2. Download and install the Windows 2000 Application Compatibility Toolkit 1.5. This is no longer available to download from Microsoft. You may be able to get hold of a copy somewhere
   3. Enable Compatibility Mode Technology:
          * Go to Start -&gt; Run...
          * Type the following: regsvr32 %systemroot%apppatchslayerui.dll
      (See Microsoft Knowledge Base Article - 279792 for more details)
   4. Install Final Fantasy VII (reboot)
   5. Run QFixApp from the toolkit
          * Use the browse button to select ff7.exe as the program to run
          * Under Layers, choose Win2000
          * Under Fixes, check the boxes: EmulateWriteFile, Shrinker, VirtualRegistry
          * Finally, hit 'Run...' and see if it works!

------------------
Notes: this method is NOT tested by me and I have no idea if it works. Try method 1 first, and if that doesn't work, you may try this one - it seems much more diffcult, though.
-------------------

8. If you haven't played the game before, I suggest you read the manual and/or the readme first, or the learning curve may be very steep.
9. Run the game and have fun! :D
10. If you still have problems, contact me here and I'll try to help you out.

===================================================

HAVE FUN PLAYING THIS GREAT GAME!
